title: Understanding Trendlines
text: A trendline is a line that represents the general direction of data points in a chart. It helps in identifying patterns or trends over time.

title: Purpose of a Trendline
text: Trendlines are often used in data analysis to make predictions about future data points based on the existing data.

hintAnswer: using a trendline to project data beyond the values or scope of the data set
title: Defining Forecasting
text: Forecasting involves using historical data to predict future outcomes. In the context of trendlines, it means projecting data beyond the current dataset.
choices: using a trendline to project data beyond the values or scope of the data set
a type of data prediction method
